response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, reflecting years of dedication and innovation in its development. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe it would be a perfect match for your needs and aspirations.

We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000, which represents an outstanding value considering its market worth and the benefits it offers. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for excellence.

Please consider this proposal carefully, and if you find it appealing, we would be more than happy to proceed with the transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out to us.

Looking forward to the possibility of bringing this product into your possession,
Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
